website_summaries.verdict: A best buy for babies with super sensitive skin for protection from strong sun.
pros: A hypoallergenic and fragrance-free sunscreen that works without irritation on baby skin reactive to other brands
It offers broad-spectrum protection that caretakers trust on vacation to the tropics
Natural sunflower, tea tree, and olive fruit oils moisturize the skin and aloe vera soothes ultra-sensitive skin
cons: Pretty thick and leaves a white residue if not fully rubbed in

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen! My kids all have very sensitive skin, and with most sunscreens and lotions, even ones made specifically for kids, they get a rash. Not with this one! This is a great sunscreen. No burns or rashes! And it smells great too! If this helped you decide to buy this or not, please click the "helpful" button under my review!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Murray

customer_reviews.title: Our pediatrician recommended this brand after our son had an allergic reaction ...
customer_reviews.text: Our pediatrician recommended this brand after our son had an allergic reaction to neutrogena sunscreen. It smells nice, is easy to apply and gives goid protection. We haven't had any sunburns using this sunscreen for our little light-skinned red head. Only downside is the long shipping. Also it says it is Prime eligibile, it took almost 2 weeks to arrive
customer_reviews.author: Meike LoRe

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sunscreen because I am out in the sun all day during the summer and am lighter skinned. It is awesome! I wear it all the time, it doesn’t burn my eyes or drip into them, and I love the bronzer in it too! It is also the best smelling sunscreen I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: JessD

customer_reviews.title: Pale girl - Best sunscreen ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the hands down best sunscreen I have ever owned. It stays on all day and has a great smell. I am a pale girl, and have not burned once with this, not even red at all. This is a first for me. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Merry Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me. I am fair skinned, went to Central America for about 2 weeks. I don't now if it stains anything... I always applied when I was in a swimsuit and it felt nice on my skin, smelled good and I didn't burn. Probably would take care if I was wearing anything light color...just a thought as it is a brownish tint.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Norris

customer_reviews.title: Nice bronzer color but shiny
customer_reviews.text: I like having an SPF lotion that has a bronzer, and the bronzer color is nice, just enough color to look healthy, but it's also very shiny. I can't use it on my face because it then looks greasy and no amount of blotting or light powder covers the shine. I will finish this bottle but then I'll shop for just a lotion. Too bad because this pale face is really pale.
customer_reviews.author: Little Red Haired Girl

customer_reviews.title: What I never knew I always needed
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and have to apply sunscreen daily just so I don’t burn while driving. Because of this my face was always paler than the rest of my body as I made sure my face was protected. I bought this on a whim and didn’t even realize it has bronzer in it that will gradually darken your skin. My face finally matches my body! So glad I bought this item
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Chunky?
customer_reviews.text: I've been an Australian Gold addict for years and this one caught me off guard. When I went to use it, it was as if the lotion separated and had small 'chunks' in it. It rubbed in fine and seemed to protect like the brand I've come to know and love but the consistency was gross. I checked the expiration date and that was good so not sure what happened. I'm going to buy it from the store next time.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Pasty Vampire Approved
customer_reviews.text: Sunscreen can seriously make or break a summer outing, and this gem of a product makes exposure to the oppressive Texas sun a bit more bearable for this pasty vampire. It smells like a goshdarn vacation, which makes me want to apply it more. I typically burn if I even think about stepping outside my lair, yet I have found this to work well for me. No burns at all thus far. It's fluid enough to blend in easily (no goopy garbage here), but not so thin that it runs everywhere. My skin feels nice and moisturized and not sticky at all. Just buy this already.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Marie

customer_reviews.title: The Nostalgic Essence of Summer
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I bought this not in the spirit of sun-safe responsibility, but in the pursuit of smelling like a warm and comforting trip to the beach. Sunscreen is the past AND future of summer eau de parfum. A positive side effect is more all-over SPF protection. Just sniffing my arm during the workday is a mini-escape, and as a plus, the ol' ball & chain enjoys it too.
customer_reviews.author: CW2592

customer_reviews.title: The bronzer doesn't really work, but still a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I bought this sunscreen for the bronzer! I'm pretty fair, and wouldn't mind a little bit of color in the summer. My niece and I both tried it and only applied to one of our arms. We couldn't tell a difference. Oh well! It's still a good sunscreen, with a very pleasant, fruity scent. But nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: goes on smoothly, not too thick or greasy
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for an SPF 50 sunscreen that has good ratings from the EWG. I tried a bunch - some made my skin super dry (Thinkbaby), some were too thick and didn't rub in well (Badger, Alba mineral), and many others didn't have high enough SPFs. I finally found a good one. This goes on smoothly, rubs in nicely, and is not too thick or greasy. It seems to stay on well, as I haven't gotten a sunburn and typically only reapply 0-1 times per day.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Fake product! 🙋🏻‍♀️ Crispy critter over here!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product! I am so disappointed as I do not believe this is an Australian Gold product. I applied and then reapplied the product 3 more times in a 4 hour period ensuring my skin was thoroughly dry and have been sunburned worse than I have with any other product. I have used other Australian Gold products purchased from big box retail stores without an issue. My entire family are crispy critters as well. Don’t purchase as you will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blisters from this product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for about 4 days in July and came home with blisters all over my body. Since I was unsure if this was the true cause, I tried it again for one day at the beach and guess what, blisters! I don't know if this was an allergic reaction but I have use tanning lotoions all my life and have never had any issues. I then spent two days in the sun just this past weekend and did NOT use this product, no Blisters. Perhaps its the bronzing element but I cant use this any more.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica VgJ

customer_reviews.title: It works but not 100%
customer_reviews.text: This product is somewhat effective, not 100% because the sun has left my left arm darker than my right, obvious when driving the sun hits our left arm directly to the drivers. Maybe there are others that protect more, I have to keep experimenting, I like the price, I tried twice to order them again, but I got tired of receiving messages that have been shipped, after a problem occurred for the delivery, twice in a row I re-ordered, twice the same boring message, I got tired of this little game and decided to cancel, I prefer to find another more responsible seller.
customer_reviews.author: Karmita

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it ..
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because it was originally $4 on subscription .. I went to cancel it and amazon upped it to over $9. So be careful .. I didn't realize they could up things on subscription so I will be canceling all of mine. The bronzer turned our palms and creases orangish brown. Myself and my two children broke out in horrible acne like rash all over our bodies a couple days after using it during a day of tubing. My son has never had acne in his life which was a red flag. It did smell great and cover well ..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle :D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing as a sunscreen and now for my daily moisturizer, scent is WONDERFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this because I'm 40 (and some change) lol! I have spent quite a a bit of time in the sun and I've damaged my skin significantly. My skin is very dry and I've been searching for a sunscreen moisturizer for daily use. Not just in the summer time. This is it folks. I will say that when you first put it on, it's a tad thick, but it soaks right in, and I use A LOT! I just decided to try this on a whim, SOOOOO glad I did!! Great great product, great smell and the price is crazy affordable. Give it a try!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great, Doesn’t bronze
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does not add any bronzing to the skin. I have been mistaken for a vampire before so bronzer would definitely be noticeable on me. I rubbed this in and nada. I don’t care, though. I bought it to avoid getting grilled from the sun. Also, Australian Gold is the best smelling sun product line, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't forget to reapply every 50 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Product has a great smell, works best on skin tones that already have a somewhat decent tan already going on. Wouldn't recommend for very fair skinned people or small children or infants.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hunn

customer_reviews.title: Watery, wouldn't recommend.  Doesn't absorb.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Australian gold products, it's all i use but this lotion with bronzer wasn't available in my area... unfortunately this bottle sent to me was extremely watery and never really absorbs into your skin... not at all what it should be when purchased in store. Not sure if it's old or not kept in the right storage climate.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Smell is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this product is amazing and a new found favorite. Product goes on easy, rubs on well, and gets you a great tan. The only downside is that it does bother my face when sitting out near the ocean sweating . It gets in the eyes and stings. But whose fault is that... mine. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should.
customer_reviews.text: Tough to find product - prior to finding it on Amazon I only found it on cruise ships. Nice light scent. I am very fair skinned (I will redden in 10 minutes), and I can tell you that this product lives up to its SPF 50 rating, even in May Caribbean sun. The month of May might not be the hottest month, but the sun's intensity is about the same as for late July.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Normal

customer_reviews.title: Smells great - Works great - Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite sunscreen. It gives a beautiful bronze glow on my pale skin, without being too overpowering (no fear of streaks like with self-tanner). The formula blends in easily and smells incredible. It offers appropriate sun protection and I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: corbey

customer_reviews.title: Zero protection
customer_reviews.text: I'm pale and take sunscreen seriously because sunburn is the WORST. I decided to try this one after reading all the great reviews and was very disappointed. The smell is great like everyone said but it did absolutely nothing to protect me from the sun. I was on the beach for 4 hours and applied every hour. When I got home and saw myself I couldn't believe how red I was! It was the worst sunburn I've had in years and I spent the 2nd half of my engagement weekend in agony. I'll never stray from my usual neutrogena sunscreen again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to, blocks sun
customer_reviews.text: This is our to go to product for sun screen. Used for years & now delivered to our door. Not a greasy feel which is why we use it!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THE SMELL OF THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE SMELL OF THIS STUFF! My boss when I worked fulltime on an island suggested this stuff to me, and while I didn't need the extra bronzer... why not? Everyone wants to look like their most tan and sunkissed self as possible! This stuff never made me look orange (my natural tan is a bit cheeto dust colored anyway), but the smell is incredible and it help up well to the ocean water/sea spray.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, priced well, but NOT for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for me, zero complaints for me. My daughter (5) and my wife both had a slight allergic reaction of some kind. I had bought this and another brand that was more money, and they used the expensive one with zero issues and I just used this.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G

customer_reviews.title: Great SPF for the face
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my face. It does a great job at protecting from sunburn. It doesn't sting my eyes which is a huge bonus! Smells great and gives long lasting SPF. This particular brand also is great at helping to protect spray tans.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Massey

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant Smell & Doesn't Absorb into Skin
customer_reviews.text: Unpleasant to apply. Does not absorb into the skin. You will just keep rubbing until.you end up wiping it off. This delays your ability to get dressed. The bubble gum smell gives me a headache. Who wants tanning lotion to smell like bubble gum? I would not recommend this or buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Australian Gold...the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Imagine...Australian Gold SPF 30 Sunscreen for less than half price? And even with a bronzer. What's not to love? I was delighted to find this amazing sale on Amazon. Thank you for keeping my skin healthy and beautifully tanned!
customer_reviews.author: BaaBee3

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is great. It has the best fragrance and goes on smoothly without feeling greasy. My mom even asked where we got it when I applied it the first time after receiving it because it smelled so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nakajima

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this product. It gave me the sun protection I was looking for and it went on nicely and had a very pleasant smell. I would definitely use this product again and do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lora D

customer_reviews.title: This has Caffeine in it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as sunblock, and did not realize it contains caffeine (which I am allergic to). It smells a bit like coffee flavored yogurt (not good for sunblock). My fiance used it several times and each time it stains her a little bit reddish orange, she's got a serious base tan so she can pull it off, but I do not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best!!
customer_reviews.text: Australian gold is the absolute best sun protection. I just love how it has a bronzer built in. It does NOT stain your clothes or hands like some other bronzers. I love how it has sunscreen built in too. Of course the smell of any Australian gold sunscreen is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lbatch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent! It's fresh and a delectable combo of coconut, orange, and vanilla. Actually receiving compliments on it! Should probably also say this is excellent sun protection as well!
customer_reviews.author: MiFunn

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I will purchase again. We have pool, live in Florida by beach. I want my daughters to have as much protection I can provide. They wear rash guard and hat but not enough. It’s very smooth to apply, doesn’t get white. I religiously apply every 1.5hrs. They never get red or burn.
customer_reviews.author: Hirokoppe

customer_reviews.title: Causes burning sensation
customer_reviews.text: We took this sunscreen with us to Mexico in August. What a disaster - it causes a burning sensation on your face right away! And it was the same effect on all my family members - adults and kids. Also, does not get absorbed that quickly. We had to go buy a different sunscreen lotion locally. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Stepenski

customer_reviews.title: best SPF50 I have found
customer_reviews.text: this is some of the best sunscreen for protection. it is fragrance free for sensitive skin and is some of the only that I have found that keeps my face from getting burnt in the sun. it is pretty thick and the coverage lasts for a long time even in water which is great for being in the pool or water of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: rockandroll

customer_reviews.title: Rash!
customer_reviews.text: Three people in my house got a rash from this. Skin turned red upon application and on face, skin started to feel a burning sensation when applied.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Wiltfong

customer_reviews.title: Took a week to get my face back to normal
customer_reviews.text: I got this 30spf for a cruise. After 2 days of using it, my face got red and raw. It looked like I had poison and it hurt to put any lotion on my face. It took a week to get my face back to normal and this was after using a Rx from the Dr. Had to stay in the shade the last 4 days of my cruise. It also turned my ring black. Once I stopped using it my ring went back to it's silver color. My husband was fine with it but I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rauhauser

customer_reviews.title: It rubbed in fine and seemed to protect like the brand I've come ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been an Australian Gold addict for years and this one caught me off guard. When I went to use it, it was as if the lotion separated and had small 'chunks' in it. It rubbed in fine and seemed to protect like the brand I've come to know and love but the consistency was gross. I checked the expiration date and that was good so not sure what happened. I'm going to buy it from the store next time.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It Is A Very Good Moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good moisturizer, and it is not heavily perfumed, great. I only wish it would help darken your skin a little more than it does. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Nilsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your face!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved this brand!!! This kept my face perfect while on vacation! Great protection and loved the bronzer!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen! I use this all during spring, summer and early fall. Gives me the SPF and a nice color base so I am not so pale when I first start wearing shorts and sundresses. The scent is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: 925LH

customer_reviews.title: Australian Gold is my favorite line when it comes to SPF
customer_reviews.text: Hand down my favorite line of sunscreen and bronzer. This bronzer smells amazing, its infused with coffee. I love all Australian Gold products and would be a spokes person for them. Product shipping on time. Packaging was great.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I was able to order this suntan lotion. We use it in the tanning bed and it's super easy to spread.
customer_reviews.author: Chessa

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Brand for Decades!!!
customer_reviews.text: The scent calms down after extended wear, but offers sun protection all day. Their line of sun care products have been around forever! Wonderful discounted price with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Helps get the prefect tan without getting burnt
customer_reviews.text: Works good and helps me get the perfect tan without getting burnt. It also helps moisturize which is a big plus. I have been using the spray but the dermatologist recommended using lotion because it gives better coverage and I can see that now.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Pettis

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging lid won’t shut.
customer_reviews.text: The lids won’t shut properly once opened. I can’t even keep it upright in the cabinet or take it anywhere with me. In order To get a refund they want me to send it back. I don’t think it is going to ship very well considering I can’t close it. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Face vs Sun
customer_reviews.text: Have used the lotion often. First time used the face protection. The face lotion is a nice thickness and applies easily. The scent is fresh and non-irritating. The tube is a good size and can go in carry-on. The cap sealed well and there was no leakage. We will buy and use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: DML

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Got the Bronzer lotion. Unfortunately, it's not "with instant bronzer" as it states, just a regular sunscreen. Very misleading info. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand of sun screen. I burn easily and wanted something that would give me great coverage while I was doing yard work/going to baseball games/etc. I applied only once over the weekend and being exposed to sun for about four hours and didn't burn. Skin care is important!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany D

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell! It's a little messy to put on, it stains my nails yellow. After I put it on I wait about 15 minutes and you can tell I look "tanner". I haven't gotten a burn while using this. I do believe it gives you a better tan than regular sun block would. It gives you a nice little confidence boost when youre looking extra tan ha ha so I recommend this to anyone especially my fellow ghosts
customer_reviews.author: PrimeMeBaby1MoreTime

customer_reviews.title: Great sun screen
customer_reviews.text: We have used this lotion for 12 or 13 years and nothing else. So happy to find it on Amazon. We boat all summer so we need go great sun screen.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen cowan

customer_reviews.title: Best Use: Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Even though this has 50spf, and its from Australia where the sun is hotter then the 7th circle of hell, it Failed as a sunscreen. I really wanted to like it for the price. Sadly there is no good discount sunscreen 😢
customer_reviews.author: Esterosalt

customer_reviews.title: Beware of enhanced age spots
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sunscreen and works great but it will darken age spots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Smells terrible when it dries I dont know if it is bad or if it just doesn't match with me. I have not purchased it before so I have nothing to compare it to scent wise. It did protect as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Crosby

customer_reviews.title: NOT Reef safe as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for snorkeling in Galapagos, need reef safe sunscreen. This product is prominently described as such, it is NOT safe for reefs. The active ingredient in this is avobenzene, one of the 'awful eight' ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Great smell, texture with a nice light bronzer tint. Love that it has a high spf of 50
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Fave sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen! I have used it for years and never had a problem. Protects me from the sun, smells amazing, and does not irritate my skin. It is a tiny bit greasy on my face like most sunscreens tend to be but not enough to be of any concern in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Marvel_B

customer_reviews.title: Smells odd
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen seems to work fine - but it is rather thin and I find the “signature scent” to be rather unpleasant. Others have said nice things about the scent - to each his own, I guess. I would prefer my sunscreen to smell like coconut, not old lady.
customer_reviews.author: HoldingUpGreat

customer_reviews.title: Stains
customer_reviews.text: Review of Australian Gold Sunscreen Lotion. It stains (ruins) clothes. See attached pics. The T shirt was washed with a pretreatment and the blue shirt (tag showing) was unwashed. Lucky me they were old clothes. As other sunblock I've used, it irritates my eyes. Although I didn't burn, I can't use this daily due to the clothing issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mallett

customer_reviews.title: Sunblock
customer_reviews.text: I'm very fair and sensitive to the sun. I've used this so far this year and haven't gotten a sunburn. It does add a slight bronze to your skin which is good for me since I'm so fair.
customer_reviews.author: jessi

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the smell
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the smell, it's fruity smelling but with that very fake banana scent like banana candy. I also thought I would like the bronzing aspect but it just wound up getting on my clothes. It washes out fine but it's annoying when you're out and you get a big streak of it on your white shirt. And I didn't think the bronzing did much for my skin. It does sting the face and eyes so be careful there. Other than that it did it's job, I didn't get sunburned. I won't buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin due to an allergy to metals, especially zinc and aluminum. Since zinc is the active ingredient in most sunscreen I haven’t been able to use sunscreen for years. Everything I’ve tried caused an extremely painful reaction. Enter Australian Gold! I haven’t had an allergic reaction, even after swimming or sweating. My face is still sensitive to the product but if it’s cold I don’t have a problem. I’m so happy to have found a sunscreen I can use! Buying it in bulk now!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie L.

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. Do not get it on your clothes, it turns white shorts orange, but does give your skin a nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley S

customer_reviews.title: Instant glow, but not tan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to avoid that thick pasty look a regular sunblock usually gives you. It spreads really nicely and smells great. When I put it on I got a nice glow, but it really didn’t make my skin look darker. My skin is pale so I really was surprised I didn’t see any difference. It’s a great sunblock otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: ninalane

customer_reviews.title: This stuff might be MAGIC...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff might be MAGIC. The only sunscreen that does it's job and doesn't leave you feeling sticky afterwards. My wife has sensitive skin, and this doesn't bother her at all...which is a HUGE plus in my book! I really appreciate a great quality product, and this is one!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Harig

customer_reviews.title: love the bronzer
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product has bronzer in it. Looks great and works well. Will buy again for sure. Its also good because my teen daughter will wear it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Terin

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but...
customer_reviews.text: Sunscreen with bronzer is brilliant. I was happy to find this after Jergens discontinued their version. This smells fine out of the bottle-I know fragrance reacts differently on different people's skin, but after I apply this, it smells like I am coated in car wax. Otherwise it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Otter Been There

customer_reviews.title: Made our skin and eyes burn
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen gave me skin a slight burning sensation (the same feeling you get when you start to sunburn) a few minutes after applying. It also made my husbands eyes and my eyes burn from it dripping down into our eyes. We ended up using our toddler's zinc based sunscreen from another brand and did not have this same experience. Will not use this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nora's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice for sensitive skin but leaves white residue
customer_reviews.text: It is very sick. It left a white residue on my baby the first time I tried it on him. I tried it on myself and I made sure to take some of that residue off I'm not sure if some of it was still there but no one said anything. No reactions and either of us and we both have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anon0129

customer_reviews.title: Great sunblock for the beach or everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Australian Gold products are the best. I love how they smell and how they feel. Sometimes they are priced higher than Banana Boat or Coppertone, but I feel a couple extra bucks is worth it for the quality of product.
customer_reviews.author: always_solo

customer_reviews.title: Smells Lovely & Goes on Easily
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I used it this past summer for the first time. Disclaimer: I am not a frequent tanner so I only ended up using it for 3 or 4 tanning sessions in my backyard. It goes on easy and has a very pleasant smell that isn't like the standard coconut sunscreen smell. I still have some left so I definitely plan on using this next year.
customer_reviews.author: Shel Gatto

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I normally either burn or don’t tan at all. But after using this product, I came back from vacation with a glowing (real looking) tan!
customer_reviews.author: Gman4Real

customer_reviews.title: Not an instant bronzer
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t bronze. It’s labeled as a sunscreen instant bronzer, but it’s only lightly tinted and does NOT provide any color at all when rubbed in. Maybe I misunderstood the description and the reviews but I thought I was buying something with bronzing tint. It smells wonderful and rubs in well, but it’s also sort of drying. Not really what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Smells like pain thinner
customer_reviews.text: The worst sunscreen I have ever had the misfortune to use. Within minutes my eyes and face were burning. It smells awful and is probably dangerous for youngsters. Whatever you do DO NOT buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: BJW

customer_reviews.title: Aloe vera
customer_reviews.text: Found out that Aloe vera that's processed into lotion is actually an irritant and does nothing for healing. Check with a dermatologist. Scent is a little over powering. Bought medical grade sun screen.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tan
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. We travel to countries that are very warm and sunny, spending a lot of time on the beach. If you want a great tan I would recommend this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: EJB

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Australian Gold products for years and have trusted the brand- until now. This is NOT spf 30! I live in Florida, sunscreen is a necessary part of anything outside. I haven’t burned in years until I used this over the weekend. Do Not Buy. I don’t know what it is but I’ll say it again- this is NOT spf 30!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bishton

customer_reviews.title: A RASH
customer_reviews.text: AUSTRALLIAN GOLD 30 WITH BRONZER GAVE ME A RASH .I MUST BE ALLERGIC TO SOMETHING IN THE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Frank P. CIPOLLINO

customer_reviews.title: This sunscreen made both of my sons skin feel like it was burning
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen made both of my sons skin feel like it was burning, especially the neck and face. It also made my face feel like it was burning. I have sensitive skin, so I wasn't as alarmed, but my sons have never complained with any other lotion. They both were in tears and had to but ice on their skin. It was awful!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Love this Self Tanner❣️
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to be in the sun so rating minimal. Not to say it isn’t good. Trying to limit my time in sun. The smell is unbelievably good! Not at all like other brands. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Jules 51

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Smells incredible and never feels sticky. The best!! All my girls love it too! Our favorite go to sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Koosah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Filmy
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this is good sunscreen, but it leaves a white film. I personally would rather it was a little greasy rather than filmy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Bought for our vacation and it work great. Also my tan was golden and the lotion smells really good. Will rebuy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is horrible don't buy it..it smells like bug spray..dried out my skin and burned the hell out of my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: mary mitchen

customer_reviews.title: Triple threat spf 45, self tanner, instant bronze
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is a self tanner as well. So while your trying to preserve your youth with that spf 45 you can still get color without the sacrifice of fine lines and burning. Plus
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Singh

customer_reviews.title: Streaky
customer_reviews.text: Used this on myself and my baby, and it left white streaks every time. It didn't rub in well and it made our skin feel dry. No sunburns though!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: It smells really good & is super moisturizing! I don't tan easily but I noticed a base tint with this after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunscreen to apply It has slight bronzer in it which doesn't really show, but prevents than annoying whitecast that sunscreen gives. Additionally, it smells like heaven. It smells like figs and honey and coconut. So good!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiN

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great sunscreen but unfortunately it doesn’t have the traditional Australian Gold scent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smell makes me feel like I am on Holiday
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen for the smell and the instant bronzing. Makes me feel like I am on vacation when I am wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal CL

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Great sunscreen that doesn't have a chemically smell. Applies smoothly and dries quickly. EXCELLENT for fair skin people like myself, I never burn when wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: great din protection
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best sun protection products available. Easy to spead and moistures the skin for even tanning. Excellent sun protection. Couldn't believe the valuable price too bad they limited only 3 at a time to be purchased. Just happy to have gotten mine. Will order 3 more my girlfriends and I share 😁
customer_reviews.author: kendra hall

customer_reviews.title: The Best !
customer_reviews.text: Been using for years, nice tan on my body, clean feeling after applying and not greasy. Super SPF !
customer_reviews.author: MarkD

customer_reviews.title: I'm an avid sun worshiper and love this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid sun worshiper and love this product. It provides the coverage I need, yes it's only a SPF 15, but for me it's what I need, and it moistruizes my skin while allowing me to get a golden tan. And it smells good too!!
customer_reviews.author: Franci Neill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed.. I am super pale, so I have to have sunscreen. This is the perfect amount of bronzer/sunscreen to where you won't get burnt! I sat outside for a few hours yesterday and I wasn't burnt at all, and actually have a tan line. Perfect medium between bronzing and sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would give me a little bit more bronzing but it sure protected me from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, but it's REALLY thick and hard to rub in fully to the point of not looking like white paste.
customer_reviews.author: Profplaydoe

product_meta.title: Australian Gold Sunscreen Lotion for Baby SPF 50, 8 Ounce | Non-Greasy | Broad Spectrum | Water Resistant
product_meta.description: Style Name:Baby| Color:SPF 50Baby Lotions are ideal for ultra-sensitive skin and maximum application control! Protect your family from UVA/UVB rays while natural Sunflower, Tea Tree and Olive Fruit Oils condition skin. Specially created with sensitive skin in mind, and formulated to be Fragrance Free.
feature_bullets: Native Australian Acacia Extract provides antioxidant benefits
Product images feature new packaging, packaging of products shipped may vary
